title: HOUR 3- Doc Emrick Oct 20, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Doc Emrick Oct 20, 2020
description:
Doc Emrick; who is about to retire, talks to Dan about Ted Williams and the different era's of major league baseball. Doc says he can not understand why hitters do not try to lay down the bunt when teams shift in the field.

content:encoded:
Doc Emrick; who is about to retire, talks to Dan about Ted Williams and the different era's of major league baseball. Doc says he can not understand why hitters do not try to lay down the bunt when teams shift in the field.
